level.heading: Form of contribution.
level.text: A contribution may consist of tangible or intangible property or other benefit to a limited liability company, including money, services performed, promissory notes, other agreements to contribute money or property, and contracts for services to be performed.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law:
level.text: This section is based on ยง 402 of the Uniform Limited Company Act (2006 Act). See Vol. 6B , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
